lead_paragraph: The 3,600-square-foot sign visible from Fenway Park has been part of the city’s skyline since 1940, and some residents are pushing for it to stay put.

headline.print_headline: Boston Building With Citgo Sign Is Sold to a Local Firm
headline.main: Boston Developer Buys Building With Citgo Sign, Raising Preservation Hopes

snippet: The 3,600-square-foot sign visible from Fenway Park has been part of the city’s skyline since 1940, and some residents are pushing for it to stay put....
abstract: Boston University announces it will sell building on which iconic Citgo sign sits to developer Related Beal; preservationists hope sale will mean sign, part of Boston's skyline since 1940, will stay; Boston Landmarks Commission has granted preliminary landmark status to sign.
